# --description-- Give the `#back-wall` element a `width` of `100%` and a `height` of `60%`. # --hints-- You should set the `width` of the `#back-wall` selector to `100%`. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('#back-wall')?.width === '100%'); ``` You should set the `height` of the `#back-wall` selector to `60%`. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('#back-wall')?.height === '60%'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Picasso Painting
``` ```css body { background-color: rgb(184, 132, 46); } #back-wall { background-color: #8B4513; --fcc-editable-region-- --fcc-editable-region-- } ```
